about_the_game:
Get ready to take the reins and adventure across Seroh Island, where wild horses run free and adventures await!

Gallop into adventure

♦ Embark on an exhilarating journey across Seroh Island, from the gentle woodlands of Gully Grove to the sun-kissed sands of Magpie Bay and beyond.

Forge Bonds

♦ Untangle the secrets of the island as you unlock pathways, piece together puzzles, and uncover hidden treasures.

Unravel the Island’s Secrets

♦ Befriend a delightful cast of characters, offering a helping hand on quests that reveal their stories.

Mastery of Horsemanship

♦ Master the art of horsemanship, breed stunning foals and beautiful rare coats, or find a forever companion at the trusted horse trader.

Thrills of Friendly Equine Contests

♦Embrace the thrill of friendly competitions, where you and your well-trained horses can showcase your skills and enjoy the rewards of success.

Nourish with Nature’s Bounty

♦ Forage for ingredients, to craft nourishing feeds to bolster your equine friends.

Expand Your Equine Haven

♦ Expand your homestead, by building barns and pastures ensuring every equine friend has a place to call home.

Steadfast Care of the Stable Hand

♦ Rest easy knowing a devoted stable hand stands watch, ensuring your equine companions are loved and cared for, allowing you to savor every moment of your grand adventure.

Gather your reins and let the adventures begin.

It’s time to ride!

name: Canter Crossing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-5350H Processor or Newer
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000 or equivalent, Integrated cards also work
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-5350H Processor or newer
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 700 series or equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
